verses.verse: And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto Jacob <WH3290>, Arise <WH6965>, go up <WH5927> to Beth-el <WH1008>, and dwell <WH3427> there: and make <WH6213> there an altar <WH4196> unto God <WH410>, that appeared <WH7200> unto thee when thou fleddest <WH1272> from the face <WH6440> of Esau <WH6215> thy brother <WH251>.

Then Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> unto his household <WH1004>, and to all that were with him, Put away <WH5493> the strange <WH5236> gods <WH430> that are among you <WH8432>, and be clean <WH2891>, and change <WH2498> your garments <WH8071>:

And let us arise <WH6965>, and go up <WH5927> to Beth-el <WH1008>; and I will make <WH6213> there an altar <WH4196> unto God <WH410>, who answered <WH6030> me in the day <WH3117> of my distress <WH6869>, and was with me in the way <WH1870> which I went <WH1980>.

And they gave <WH5414> unto Jacob <WH3290> all the strange <WH5236> gods <WH430> which were in their hand <WH3027>, and all their earrings <WH5141> which were in their ears <WH241>; and Jacob <WH3290> hid <WH2934> them under the oak <WH424> which was by Shechem <WH7927>.

And they journeyed <WH5265>: and the terror <WH2847> of God <WH430> was upon the cities <WH5892> that were round about <WH5439> them, and they did not pursue <WH7291> after <WH310> the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290>.
¶ So Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> to Luz <WH3870>, which is in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, that is, Beth-el <WH1008>, he and all the people <WH5971> that were with him.

And he built <WH1129> there an altar <WH4196>, and called <WH7121> the place <WH4725> El-beth-el <WH416>: because there God <WH430> appeared <WH1540> unto him, when he fled <WH1272> from the face <WH6440> of his brother <WH251>.

But Deborah <WH1683> Rebekah's <WH7259> nurse <WH3243> died <WH4191>, and she was buried <WH6912> beneath Beth-el <WH1008> under an oak <WH437>: and the name <WH8034> of it was called <WH7121> Allon-bachuth <WH439>.
¶ And God <WH430> appeared <WH7200> unto Jacob <WH3290> again, when he came <WH935> out of Padan-aram <WH6307>, and blessed <WH1288> him.

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto him, Thy name <WH8034> is Jacob <WH3290>: thy name <WH8034> shall not be called <WH7121> any more Jacob <WH3290>, but Israel <WH3478> shall be thy name <WH8034>: and he called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Israel <WH3478>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto him, I am God <WH410> Almighty <WH7706>: be fruitful <WH6509> and multiply <WH7235>; a nation <WH1471> and a company <WH6951> of nations <WH1471> shall be of thee, and kings <WH4428> shall come <WH3318> out of thy loins <WH2504>;
And the land <WH776> which I gave <WH5414> Abraham <WH85> and Isaac <WH3327>, to thee I will give it <WH5414>, and to thy seed <WH2233> after thee <WH310> will I give <WH5414> the land <WH776>.
And God <WH430> went up <WH5927> from him in the place <WH4725> where he talked <WH1696> with him.

And Jacob <WH3290> set up <WH5324> a pillar <WH4676> in the place <WH4725> where he talked <WH1696> with him, even a pillar <WH4678> of stone <WH68>: and he poured <WH5258> a drink offering <WH5262> thereon, and he poured <WH3332> oil <WH8081> thereon.
And Jacob <WH3290> called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> where God <WH430> spake <WH1696> with him, Beth-el <WH1008>.

¶ And they journeyed <WH5265> from Beth-el <WH1008>; and there was but <WH5750> a little <WH3530> way <WH776> to come <WH935> to Ephrath <WH672>: and Rachel <WH7354> travailed <WH3205>, and she had hard <WH7185> labour <WH3205>.
And it came to pass, when she was in hard <WH7185> labour <WH3205>, that the midwife <WH3205> said <WH559> unto her, Fear <WH3372> not; thou shalt have this son <WH1121> also.

And it came to pass, as her soul <WH5315> was in departing <WH3318>, (for she died <WH4191>) that she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Ben-oni <WH1126>: but his father <WH1> called <WH7121> him Benjamin <WH1144>.
And Rachel <WH7354> died <WH4191>, and was buried <WH6912> in the way <WH1870> to Ephrath <WH672>, which is Beth-lehem <WH1035>.
And Jacob <WH3290> set <WH5324> a pillar <WH4676> upon her grave <WH6900>: that is the pillar <WH4678> of Rachel's <WH7354> grave <WH6900> unto this day <WH3117>.
¶ And Israel <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265>, and spread <WH5186> his tent <WH168> beyond <WH1973> the tower <WH4026> of Edar <WH4029>.

And it came to pass, when Israel <WH3478> dwelt <WH7931> in that land <WH776>, that Reuben <WH7205> went <WH3212> and lay <WH7901> with Bilhah <WH1090> his father's <WH1> concubine <WH6370>: and Israel <WH3478> heard <WH8085> it. Now the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The sons <WH1121> of Leah <WH3812>; Reuben <WH7205>, Jacob's <WH3290> firstborn <WH1060>, and Simeon <WH8095>, and Levi <WH3878>, and Judah <WH3063>, and Issachar <WH3485>, and Zebulun <WH2074>:
The sons <WH1121> of Rachel <WH7354>; Joseph <WH3130>, and Benjamin <WH1144>:
And the sons <WH1121> of Bilhah <WH1090>, Rachel's <WH7354> handmaid <WH8198>; Dan <WH1835>, and Naphtali <WH5321>:

And the sons <WH1121> of Zilpah <WH2153>, Leah's <WH3812> handmaid <WH8198>; Gad <WH1410>, and Asher <WH836>: these are the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290>, which were born <WH3205> to him in Padan-aram <WH6307>.

¶ And Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> unto Isaac <WH3327> his father <WH1> unto Mamre <WH4471>, unto the city of Arbah <WH7153>, which is Hebron <WH2275>, where Abraham <WH85> and Isaac <WH3327> sojourned <WH1481>.
And the days <WH3117> of Isaac <WH3327> were an hundred <WH3967> <WH8141> and fourscore <WH8084> years <WH8141>.

And Isaac <WH3327> gave up the ghost <WH1478>, and died <WH4191>, and was gathered <WH622> unto his people <WH5971>, being old <WH2205> and full <WH7649> of days <WH3117>: and his sons <WH1121> Esau <WH6215> and Jacob <WH3290> buried <WH6912> him.
